taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a project with imported applications.

step.cmd: From the Package Explorer view double-click on the model you want to change.
step.stepresult: The enquiry model is opened with graphical editor. Properties are available in the properties view.

step.cmd: Select anywhere in the editor to access to the enquiry properties themself.
Select a specific widget, like a Fixed selection box to have access to its properties.
step.stepresult: The properties View title displays "Fixed Selection".

step.cmd: Navigate in tabs to search for the properties to modify.
Press keys Ctrl+S to save your model.
